_title_display: Bibliotheca veterum patrum atiquorumque scriptorum ecclesiasticorum, postrema Lugdunensi longe locupletior atque accuratior / cura & studio Andreeæ Gallandii presbyteri Congregationis Oratorii.

publisher.value: Ex typographia Joaniis Baptistæ Albritii Hieron. fil

description.value: Title printed in red and black; engraved title vignette; engraved pictorial initials; tail-pieces.
Bound in paper-covered boards; vellum spine with gilt label; edges sprinkled blue; armorial bookplates on front pastedown (removed from v. 6); stamp of King's Inns Library Dublin on t.p. versos.
